code: import{combineReducers,legacy_createStore as createStore,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import{cartReducer}from"./cartReducer";import{composeWithDevTools}from"redux-devtools-extension";import thunk from"redux-thunk";var rootReducer=combineReducers({cart:cartReducer});var initial_data={cart:{cart_items:localStorage.getItem('cart_items')?JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart_items')):[]}};var middleware=[thunk];export var store=createStore(rootReducer,initial_data,composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleware)));
